name: Agricio
description:
Warning this game is an early prototype

There maybe be game breaking bugs 

Agricio is a procedurally generated city builder(or rather empire builder),

where you can set up your own colony, get over the initial days of trouble and eventually form your own empire!

Game rules:

  • As long as the human population is greater than zero your colony is alive(duh)
  • You can make houses with wood
  • Wheat is the only source of food for humans so use it wisely
  • Wheat fields produce wheat
  • Place tables to increase your wood production
  • Each wheat fields cost 3 wheat(because you need seeds to grow wheat)
  • If wheat falls to zero, there's a very big chance that your colony is going to die out and you can't do anything except just watch them die
  • IF your colony dies, press R to restart
  • There is a cheat console(the black button on right) type help in that to show all commands if you want to use it
  • Hover over different buttons and text to see the tips
  • Have Fun :)

Full team:

Programmer: Kittycat

Musician: Aenjo

Artist: Noisy

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Left click to place buildings

Also please provide some feedback after playing :)
